<h1 align="center">
  Ultimate Gatsby Starter
</h1>

The Ultimate Gatsby Starter is chalk full of usefull tools to get you started using Gatsby with React Bootstrap. Inside of the template you'll find:
      <ul>
        <li>100% Responsive</li>
        <li>gatsby-plugin-image</li>
          <ul>
            <li>StaticImage</li>
            <li>GatsbyImage</li>
            <li>getImage</li>
          </ul>
        <li>Gatsby Background Image</li>
        <li>React Bootstrap (w/ Bootstrap version 5.0)</li>
          <ul>
            <li>Containers, Rows and Cols all setup</li>
            <li>Responsive Navigation</li>
          </ul>
        <li>Gatsby preload fonts</li>
        <li>custom css file</li>
        <li>React Font Awesome</li>
        <li>Sticky Footer</li>
        <li>Form with spam captcha (via Netlify Forms)</li>
      </ul>



<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->
# ultimate-gatsby-starter
